breakfast.description: In the morning, Felix sets the table, including the butter, the jam, and all the ustensils. We don't quite trust him with the mugs of hot coffee yet. He even puts things in front of the right person, describing them as he goes: "mommy 'poon, my 'poon, my coupe...".
breakfast.title: Breakfast

cole1.description: This is Cole Pepper. Cole and his parents lives right around the corner for us. He spent an afternoon with us.
cole1.title: Cole 1

cole2.description:
At first, there was tension because Cole really wanted to push Nounours's stroller around. Felix is good about sharing most of his toys, but Nounours is off limits.

We reached a compromised: Felix took care of Nounours, and Cole seranaded them on the harmonica.
cole2.title: Cole 2

cole3.description: Nounours is sporting a hand-made afghan made by great-grandma.
cole3.title: Cole 3

cole4.description: Cole picks up the tempo with a drum solo, when Fireman Felix is called for an emergency recovery of a cat in a lego tree.
cole4.title: Cole 4

cole5.description: Felix has loved firetrucks for months, but he didn't know what they were for, until he saw a cartoon of firemen rescuing a cat from a tree. Now, playing "tree, up, cat, ladder, help!" is one of his very favorite game, with or without props.
cole5.title: Cole 5

cole6.description: Yeah! Another cat safe and sound! Hooray for the firemen! What a noble profession.
cole6.title: Cole 6

house1.description: For a few weeks now, this fort of foam mattresses and blankets has been a feature of our living room. But what's in it?
house1.title: House 1

house2.description:
It's Felix and Nounours!

Privacy, please.
house2.title: House 2

keenan.description: Keenan spent a night with us. Felix is taking careful notes on how to play video games.
keenan.title: Keenan

shoes.description: Felix loves being in our shoes.
shoes.title: Shoes

description: As we said before, Felix loves receiving praise. Lately, he has also started giving praise. When we build an especially cool thing in Lego or in Play-Doh, he exclaims "Nice!". It is especially rewarding, because he is demonstrating very discerning taste.
title: February 1
